description: This file defines a service class `UserService` in a Java Spring Boot project responsible for user-related operations such as reading user data by identification number and retrieving paginated lists of users. It interacts with a `UserRepository` for data access and uses a `UserMapper` to convert entity objects to DTOs.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: A Spring service class that manages user data operations, including fetching user details by identification and retrieving paginated user lists.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Fetches a user by identification number, throws EntityNotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: readUsers
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users.
